statements: DELETE FROM energy_storage_capacity WHERE energy_consumption > 100 AND energy_generation < 50;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE date = '2022-09-15' AND location = 'NYC';
DELETE FROM storage_capacity WHERE capacity < 1000 AND location = 'LA';
DELETE FROM EnergyStorageCapacity WHERE id = 1 AND date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM EnergyStorageHistory WHERE operation = 'Recharge' AND energy_level > 80.0;
DELETE FROM EnergyProductionData WHERE date = '2021-10-15' AND time = '08:00:00';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE customer_id = 101 AND consumption_date = '2022-01-15';
